org.forgerock.cuppa

Class TestCuppaSupport

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.forgerock.cuppa.TestCuppaSupport

  • public final class TestCuppaSupport
extends java.lang.Object
    A collection of static methods for facilitating the writing of tests for Cuppa and its extensions (such as test block transforms).

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods

    • Method Detail

      • defineTests

        public static TestBlock defineTests(java.lang.Runnable testDefiner)
        Define some Cuppa tests. Use this in a test to avoid declaring a new class for your test's tests.
        Parameters:
        testDefiner - A function which will call Cuppa methods to define tests.
        Returns:
        the root test block containing all the tests defined by the given function.

      • runTests

        public static void runTests(TestBlock testBlock,
                            Reporter reporter)
        Helper method to simplify running tests.
        Parameters:
        testBlock - The root test block that contains all tests to be run.
        reporter - The reporter to use to report test results.

      • runTests

        public static void runTests(TestBlock testBlock,
                            Reporter reporter,
                            Tags tags)
        Helper method to simplify running tests.
        Parameters:
        testBlock - The root test block that contains all tests to be run.
        reporter - The reporter to use to report test results.
        tags - Tags to filter the tests on.

      • findTest

        public static Test findTest(TestBlock testBlock,
                            java.lang.String description)
        Finds the first test with the given description.
        Parameters:
        testBlock - the root test block to search under.
        description - The description.
        Returns:
        The test.
        Throws:
        java.util.NoSuchElementException - If no test was found with the given description.

      • findTestBlock

        public static TestBlock findTestBlock(TestBlock testBlock,
                                      java.lang.String description)
        Finds the first test block with the given description.
        Parameters:
        testBlock - the root test block to search under.
        description - The description.
        Returns:
        The test block.
        Throws:
        java.util.NoSuchElementException - If no test block was found with the given description.

      • findHook

        public static Hook findHook(TestBlock testBlock,
                            java.lang.String description)
        Finds the first hook with the given description.

        Hooks are searched breadth-first, i.e. going through a test block's before, after, beforeEach and afterEach hooks before searching in nested test blocks.

        Parameters:
        testBlock - the root test block to search under.
        description - The description.
        Returns:
        The hook.
        Throws:
        java.util.NoSuchElementException - If no hook was found with the given description.
